content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Jesse Plemons

}}
The following is a list of awards and nominations received by American actor Jesse Plemons. Plemons has received various awards and nominations. For his work in television, he has received three Primetime Emmy Award nominations, two Screen Actors Guild Award nominations, winning the second, and three Critics' Choice Television Award nominations, including one win in 2016 for Fargo.
In 2021, Plemons starred as a rancher in Jane Campion's The Power of the Dog. For his work, Plemons received a BAFTA nomination and an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actor.
